pr_title: [1.15] Add extra debugging information to the MDK

timeline.message: Add extra debugging to the MDK

timeline.bodyText:
You should probably use a lifecycle logger here instead of the usual System.out.println
Something like project.getLogger().lifecycle(..) will do i think.
timeline.author: OrionDevelopment

replies.bodyText: Disregard the previous review, has been cleared up as, requested and already merged in to 1.16.
replies.author: OrionDevelopment
